entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 12:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: NNE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Flurries beginning late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
